p: Dejene et al. [ 46] reported that the plant faces threats such as fire, clearing, grazing, timber harvesting, leaf harvesting, fruit harvesting, flower harvesting, root harvesting, bark harvesting, charcoal making, pest infestation, drought, and others. Whereas, the regenerative capacity of the plant is promising. The result indicated that the plant is among one having higher regenerative capacity among wild edible plants ( Figure 1).
